an10.167:1.1: Tena kho pana samayena jāṇussoṇi brāhmaṇo tadahuposathe sīsaṃnhāto navaṃ khomayugaṃ nivattho allakusamuṭṭhiṃ ādāya bhagavato avidūre ekamantaṃ ṭhito hoti.
an10.167:2.1: Addasā kho bhagavā jāṇussoṇiṃ brāhmaṇaṃ tadahuposathe sīsaṃnhātaṃ navaṃ khomayugaṃ nivatthaṃ allakusamuṭṭhiṃ ādāya ekamantaṃ ṭhitaṃ.
an10.167:2.3: “kiṃ nu tvaṃ, brāhmaṇa, tadahuposathe sīsaṃnhāto navaṃ khomayugaṃ nivattho allakusamuṭṭhiṃ ādāya ekamantaṃ ṭhito?
an10.167:3.1: “Yathā kathaṃ pana, brāhmaṇa, brāhmaṇānaṃ paccorohaṇī hotī”ti?
an10.167:3.2: “Idha, bho gotama, brāhmaṇā tadahuposathe sīsaṃnhātā navaṃ khomayugaṃ nivatthā allena gomayena pathaviṃ opuñjitvā haritehi kusehi pattharitvā antarā ca velaṃ antarā ca agyāgāraṃ seyyaṃ kappenti.
an10.167:3.3: Te taṃ rattiṃ tikkhattuṃ paccuṭṭhāya pañjalikā aggiṃ namassanti:
an10.167:3.6: Tassā ca rattiyā accayena paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena brāhmaṇe santappenti.
an10.167:3.7: Evaṃ, bho gotama, brāhmaṇānaṃ paccorohaṇī hotī”ti.
an10.167:4.1: “Aññathā kho, brāhmaṇa, brāhmaṇānaṃ paccorohaṇī hoti, aññathā ca pana ariyassa vinaye paccorohaṇī hotī”ti.
an10.167:4.2: “Yathā kathaṃ pana, bho gotama, ariyassa vinaye paccorohaṇī hoti?
an10.167:4.3: Sādhu me bhavaṃ gotamo tathā dhammaṃ desetu yathā ariyassa vinaye paccorohaṇī hotī”ti.
an10.167:5.1: “Tena hi, brāhmaṇa, suṇāhi, sādhukaṃ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
an10.167:5.2: “Evaṃ, bho”ti kho jāṇussoṇi brāhmaṇo bhagavato paccassosi.
an10.167:6.2: ‘pāṇātipātassa kho pāpako vipāko diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāyañcā’ti.
an10.167:10.3: So iti paṭisaṅkhāya pisuṇaṃ vācaṃ pajahati;
an10.167:11.3: So iti paṭisaṅkhāya pharusaṃ vācaṃ pajahati;
an10.167:15.5: Evaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, ariyassa vinaye paccorohaṇī hotī”ti.
an10.167:16.1: “Aññathā kho, bho gotama, brāhmaṇānaṃ paccorohaṇī hoti, aññathā ca pana ariyassa vinaye paccorohaṇī hoti.
an10.167:16.2: Imissā, bho gotama, ariyassa vinaye paccorohaṇiyā brāhmaṇānaṃ paccorohaṇī kalaṃ nāgghati soḷasiṃ.
an10.167:16.4: upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
